entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [.NET 9.0 Regression] "Credentials supplied to the package were not recognized" when using certificates with wcf client #110067
  • .NET 9 refuses to run any application on my system #110065
  • Deadlock in GC when attached profiler calls ICorProfilerInfo4::EnumThreads using .NET9 runtime #110062
  • SingleFile Bundler should use the managed Mach-O signer #110055
    10.0.0
  • UnsafeAccessor does not work for generic constructors, .NET 9 #110054
  • Stock Blazor standalone app with AOT compilation enabled fails to load in up-to-date Chrome when the host OS is Linux #110056
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: #110052
  • [API Proposal]: Like WebApplicationBuilder allow us to put a finished IConfiugration instance into a HostBuilder #110051
    Future
  • Matrix4x4.CreateReflection gives incorrect results in .NET 9 #110050
  • [wasm] Run Wasm.Build.Tests across .NET versions #110049
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Json reference handling allow per-type customization #110048
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: IndexOf extension method on IEnumerable<T> #110045
  • SPMI: TFM should not be hardcoded for microbenchmark collections #110043
    Future
  • System.Reflection.Emit doesn't work on linux and wsl ubuntu #110042
  • Test failure: JIT/jit64/hfa/main/testE/hfa_sf1E_r/hfa_sf1E_r.cmd #110040
  • Request to Update Target Framework for Microsoft.Extensions.AI.Abstractions #110039
  • Blazor WebAssembly AOT failed with VS2022 17.12.1 Professional #110038
  • `wasm` not support the FrameworkReference of `Microsoft.AspNetCore.App` #110036
  • Globilization country list only returns 2 characters and not the full name #110035

Closed

  • LoggerMessageAttribute and EventID inconsistency with non-code generated logging. #110021
    Future
  • Breaking Change in .NET 9.0.0 causes incorrect behavior of TypeScript Compiler running with Jurassic #110004
  • ILC: Add property for target processor tuning #108540
  • Calling instance-based methods with function pointers is not supported #110061
  • cmov not being used in nested hand-unrolled loop #109940
  • ios-arm64 helix queue: Failed to list devices #110008
  • Cross-OS native compilation is not supported. #109284
  • Application Build with sdk .NET9 rc-1 and .NET9 rc-2 were not working in Azure app service(Linux) #109212
  • Native AOT doesn't include new core lib APIs provided by NuGet packages #105274
    10.0.0
  • OleDB has crashes and access violation exceptions when using databases in specific versions of 64 bit MSAccess #109995
  • SseFormatter internal buffer doesn't grow properly and throws #110028
    10.0.0
  • MailAddress accepts invalid email address with consecutive dots #109590
    Future
  • StackAlongDimension does not return correct result #108615
    10.0.0
  • Inconsistent DeflateStream output between .net8 and .net9 #110041
  • Crash with "munmap_chunk(): invalid pointer" error #106738
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Detect and handle imprecision in 3-opt layout cost computation #110069
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enlarge stack overflow handling helper stack #110068
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove 2 more casting helper method frames #110064
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use the managed signer to remove the code signature from singlefile bundles #110063
    area-Single-File, area-HostModel, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix hostfxr.h to be valid C again. #110060
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #110059
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #110058
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Matrix4x4.CreateReflection when D is not zero #110057
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] fix stack 2x2 tensor along dimension 1 #110053
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, 9.0.x
  • Fix BufferExtensions.Write to specify sizeHint to GetSpan #110047
    area-System.Memory
  • Fix UNC paths #110033
    area-Host

Merged

  • JIT: Fix JITDUMP null dereference during value numbering #110066
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Improve containment for widening intrinsics #109474
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Make contracts tests use mock/placeholder target instead of actual target #110027
    test-enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Arm64-SVE: Fix up comments in optimizemaskconversions #109955
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Fix hostfxr.h to be valid C again. #109763
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • JIT: Replace `BlockSet` with `BitVec`, and remove BB epoch #110034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix stack 2x2 tensor along dimension 1 #108620
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #109988
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • threads.h: Fix up grammar/spelling in vm/threads.h #109972
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • MailAddress accepts invalid email address with consecutive dots #109690
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Small clean up in assertionprop for relops #109987
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding CPUID for AVX10.2 #109302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete pragma suppression for warning disabled with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #110030
    area-System.Net
  • Replace DAMT.All with more restricted annotation on InvokeMember/FindMembers/DeclaredMembers #109801
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix PooledByteBufferWriter handling of sizeHint <= 0 #110031
    area-System.Net
  • Update DynamicallyAccessedMembers annotation on EventSource #110001
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Non-PGO calli/delegate call transformation #109679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Propagate static readonly loads by value during inlining #108579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add GFNI Intrinsics #109537
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Don't use a GVM in Linq Select with NAOT by default #109978
    area-System.Linq, size-reduction, community-contribution
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols: Force using LDAP V3 for SASL binding #109450
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cDAC] Implement ReJIT portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #109936
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove some `fgRenumberBlocks` calls #110026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold null checks against known non-null values #109164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adds Linux CMake presets for coreclr #110029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix length check for Convert.TryToHexString{Lower} #109891
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109990
    area-System.Threading
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for generic span casting #109136
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Automate dl 9 0 #109291
    area-Workloads, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109143
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #109332
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix return address hijacking with CET #109548
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Disable GS cookie checks for LightUnwind #109530
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add forwarding support for WasmLinkage on LibraryImport #109364
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Replace a few SuppressMessage annotations with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #109186
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add a missing = in BigInteger.cs #109732
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix regression in constructor parameter binding logic. #109813
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.x
  • Avoid IndexOutOfRangeException in ZipArchive #109168
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure proper cleanup of key files when not persisting them #109845
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Ensure proper cleanup of key files when not persisting them #109844
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] `TensorPrimitives` XML docs: `MinNumber`/`ReciprocalSqrt`/`ReciprocalSqrtEstimate` oversights #109922
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix transformer handling of boolean schemas in JsonSchemaExporter. #109975
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix handling of IDynamicInterfaceCastable wrt CastCache #110007
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109989
    area-System.Threading
  • [Tests] Add more logging for runtime test timeouts #109998
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Avoid exception when parsing AD path for port number #109977
    bug, area-System.DirectoryServices, regression-from-last-release, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Use reaching definitions in CSE to update conservative VNs #109959
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #109920
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Suppress IL3000 in MsQuicApi constructor #109965
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • SPMI: Switch back to unpinned 9.0 SDK for micro benchmarks #109992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] WebSocket stress #108770
    area-System.Net
  • Add numerical ordering option for string comparison operations #109861
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Expand "return condition" into "return condition ? true : false" #107499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove redundant sign/zero extension for SIMD broadcasts #108824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #109996
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] Remove SwiftTypeInfo and related types #2803
  • [SwiftBindings] TODO - address various SwiftTypeInfo issues in parser and emitter #2802
  • [SwiftBindings] Update TypeMetadataKind to include current extended values #2801
  • [SwiftBindings] Add value witness table support #2800
  • [SwiftBindings] Add NominalTypeDescriptor support #2799
  • [Swift Binding] Projecting frozen structs #2797

PullRequests

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] Added TypeMetadata, removed SwiftTypeInfo #2804
  • [SwiftBindings] Describe projecting generic structs #2796
    area-SwiftBindings

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] `install-llvm.ps1` improvements for Linux #2798
  • [SwiftBindings] SwiftHandle #2793
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove PS download on Linux #2795

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Automate `WasmDebugging.csproj` via LLDB scripting #2785
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [SwiftBindings] Binding process doc #2779
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add WasmExternalDwarf property to create an external_debug_info section #2786
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistent casing of Configuration msbuild property when ArtifactsPath is set and unset #45026
  • dotnet watch 9.0 regression: killing process without further information #45024
  • dotnet watch reloading of razor class library CSS has regressed in 9.0 #45011
  • APICompat is failing when being used with desktop msbuild #45004
  • unexpected control chracter output from dotnet run #45002
  • GenAPI formatting of enums #44999

Closed

  • dotnet test command does not respect case of --configuration when using --artifacts-path #44991
  • .NET SDK 8.0.404 ignores `<EnablePreviewFeatures>True` in dotnet build #44985
  • When i use "dotnet publish" to generate osx-arm64 binary file on my win-x64 pc. I get an incorrect format file. #44359

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24571.1 #45027
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use temp directory as TestExecutionDirectory in RunTestsOnHelix.sh #45022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use managed Mach-O signer on non-Mac hosts #45019
    area-Host, untriaged
  • Update vs-solutionpersistence to 1.0.23 #45018
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Use the static factory for creating a logger #45009
    untriaged, Area-CLI, DO NOT MERGE
  • Disable VMR updates for `dotnet/scenario-tests` #45005
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add implicit reference to `Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Internal.Assets` #44997
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Using ConsoleLogger to prevent unexpected behavior #45015
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Allow nuget-client test binaries #44989
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines #45003
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Run all steps in a container #44969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial attempt at removing explicit #nullable enable in source #44936
    untriaged
  • Build installers on Windows in aspnetcore. #44828
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Improve globbing match performance #44159
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Enable test timeout dump collection #44730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Signing in Repos that Override Build Actions #44855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • format: stop checking for dotnet cli version #44958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make the toolsResolverCache path overridable using an environment variable. Fixes #11432. #43576
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature
  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2586303 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix: CLI Help missing package description #44954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44990
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected ruleConfiguationOverrides entries in SARIF #76004

Closed

  • Add public APIs for FixAll functionality for CodeRefactorings #60703
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Completion/resolve computes text changes agains incorrect snapshot #60598
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Remove unneeded code-style options, or not include more of them #60584
    Backlog
  • Completion offered for WinForms type that is not actually available #60583
    Backlog
  • Add Tools Options Telemetry #60569
    Backlog
  • Incorrect diagnostic that Deconstruct method is unused. #75995
    Backlog
  • Consider clearing state of iterator state machine when disposal completes #75666
    17.13 P2
  • `NullableWalker.Scan().getFieldSymbolToBeInitialized()`: Is checking IsAutoProperty sufficient or should we check the appropriate accessors are missing or auto-implemented #75245
    17.13 P2
  • Casting a literal `true` or `false` to a function pointer crashes csc.exe #75933
    17.13
  • Wrong error when compiling code containing IEnumerable<Span<T>> #76007

PullRequests

Created

  • Update docs to add a new LangVer #76011
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Backport] RedirectFeaturesAnalyzers test fixes #76010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • VBOverloadResolutionPriority: break attribute binding cycles, clone a bunch of C# tests #76008
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • WIP: Add WithElement syntax #76003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Expose FAR to cohosting #76002
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update the Copilot powered Inline Rename UX #76001
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix symbol display for backing fields #76000
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Mark used deconstruct methods. #76012
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Clear hoisted locals when disposing iterator and async-iterator state machines #75908
    Area-Compilers, 17.13 P2
  • Check for BackingField instead of IsAutoProperty in NullableWalker #75872
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Use VisitRvalue to visit a function pointer #75996
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reuse segments during SegmentedDictionary growth #75943
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add a couple common type sizes to SegmentedArrayHelper's size/shift/offsetmask methods so those values can be inlined. #75944
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add fixer to convert from bound generic types in nameof to unbound types. #75976
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #76006
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode, Next
  • Prefer array to ReadOnlySpan over Span #75853
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to release/dev17.13 #75993
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode
  • [backport] Update structured logger #75994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not pay attention to Overload Resolution Priority for properties assigned in attributes #75958
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority

Updated

  • Merge doc comments across multiple parts #76013
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Include project diagnostic suppressors in host analyzer execution #75684
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make MaxSupportedLangVersion calculation dynamic #75795
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13 P2
  • Simplify tests #75977
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, VSCode
  • Add LSP handler to test Gladstone integration #75146
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consider RefSafetyRules with UnscopedRef #75930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix switch indentation for list patterns #75953
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Record "nameof(UnboundGenericType<>)" as done #75982
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations from enumerator allocations in AnalyzerExecutor.ExecuteSyntaxNodeActions #75940
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Fix null encoding in new document in move type action #74623
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • --document-name flag not being respected when generating open api documents at build time. #59097
  • Document that QuickGrid may render additional empty rows on the last page when using a paginator that should be appropriately styled #59096
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Connections.Abstractions 9.0 needs additional TFM net8.0 #59095
  • JsonTypeInfoExtensions.GetSchemaReferenceId throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException for nested generic types #59092
  • [Blazor] .NET 9 generated JS uses high version syntax leading to compatibility issues #59090
    Backlog
  • SignalR hub Disconnects after 45minutes of connected to Server #59086
  • nuget package 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client' is not compatible with Blazor server webassembly using .NET 8.0 #59085
  • OnAfterRenderAsync does not fire in MainLayout .net 9 #59084

Closed

  • AddIdentityApiEndpoints breaks Blazor's RedirectToLogin behavior. #57900
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Make it simple to remove 'Use Another Service To Login' #18164
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Blazor app template does not respect RequireConfirmedAccount==false when changing email address #54207
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Unable to send 2fa code to mail & unable to obtain GET account/2fa and POST account/2fa in dotnet 8 identity endpoints. #53169
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Changes to IdentityApiEndpointRouteBuilderExtensions made get api/User/manage/info pointless #52311
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Paginator renders extra empty rows when page isn't full of items #57199
    .NET 10 Planning
  • SignalR hub Disconnects after 45minutes of connected to Server #59087
  • Rebuild fails when fingerprinting compiled TypeScript in VS 17.12.0 #58948
  • Fahrenheit is misspelled in Blazor templates #59089
    10.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Blazor Server - ObjectDisposedException with Scoped Services in Blazor Server During Disconnections #58887
  • [Blazor] Detect pre compressed assets in packages, avoid compressing those assets and emit a warning instead #57518
    9.0.x
  • Perf improvement: single_query #59080

PullRequests

Created

  • Add WebAssemblyHotReloadCapabilities msbuild property #59094
    area-blazor, 9.0.x

Merged

  • Fixing misspelling of Fahrenheit #59088
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Build installers at the end of the repo build and allow building with desktop msbuild #58987
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • perf: improve allocations in `OwinEnvironment` #58917
    Perf, area-networking
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Handling CultureInfo.InvariantCulture in RequestLocalizationMiddleware #58844
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware, 10.0-preview1
  • remove redundant initializer in HttpValidationProblemDetails #58864
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/9.0] Fix SignalR Java POM to include description #58896
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x
  • Nested Editor<T> Null Reference Exception. Fix a bug in the HtmlFieldPrefix.cs:23 #58888
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Focused event is triggered infinitely on editor control #26043
  • Dotnet 9 Memory leaks: ViewModel with lists always stays in memory + BindableLayout leaks #26042
  • CollectionView Faults With InvalidOperationException on Windows #26038
    Backlog
  • .NET10.0 #26027
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Android] BoxView Allows Touch Actions to Below Element When InputTransparent is False #26026
    Backlog
  • XFDF File Type Not Functioning in Input Element on Blazor MAUI Android #26017
  • MAUI Grouped ListView Remove Item Causes Error when more than one Group item exists #26015
  • TabbedPage displaying contents of last tab while other tab was selected #26014
    Backlog
  • Nested FlexLayout not working #26013
    Backlog
  • Dropdown menu on html select item not at correct position in Blazor #26007

Closed

  • App crash when using remote device #26041
  • [ci] Fix sign and build workloads dnceng #26023
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • After updating Windows 10, Windows can no longer manage any appx packages, and I can't deploy WinUI 3 apps from VS #25832
    Backlog
  • [Android] BoxView Fails to Block Input Events When InputTransparent is Set to False #26019
  • Updating Visual Studio 2022 to 17.12.1 breaks all Maui builds #26020
  • [windows] Processing Resources failed with error: Duplicate Entry #22342
  • Accounts count sets to 0 in MSAL, after the application auto update. (Windows) #22928
  • .NET 8 MAUI Push Notifications (Android) using Azure Notification Hub FCM V1 protocol #23010
  • fileprovider fails to open file with write permission #19722
  • Code Signing fails for iOS #15344
  • Azure B2C within MAUI Mobile Apps #14380
  • What does the IconImageSource property of ContentPage do? #8404
  • Navigation to ContentPage make weird animation on IOS #15684
  • Character dIsplayed very differently in Android and Windows. #19597
  • CollectionView ItemsUpdatingScrollMode got to top of list #25994
  • ContentPresenter just rendering component string in .Net9 #25887
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync Crashes Android Emulator Debug Session #25816
  • When i run .net maui hybrid project, then its not working in window 11 pro dev #26012
  • SystemResources depends on DependencyService #24216
  • [Maui Embedded] DisconnectHandler not called when view is closed/disposed #18366
  • The colors in MAUI application are wrong #19356

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix leak on Command Element #26044
    community ✨
  • [Windows] `FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory` returns different path after updating to latest version - fix #26039
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Remove the sample font file #26036
    area-templates
  • Fall back to loading .NET 8 date strings #26033
    area-essentials, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 16 #26029
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fixed Editor and ScrollView problems in iOS #26024
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, area-controls-editor
  • [iOS] Fixed HeaderFooterGrid to pass on CV1 and CV2 #26022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix crash setting MenuFlyoutSubItem IconImageSource #26021
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-flyout, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fixed Extra Padding on iOS buttons required when image on top or bottom #26018
    community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] [Android] Fix for Shell custom FlyoutIcon display problem #26016
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Windows] Disable HitTest when showing EmptyView on CollectionView #26006
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, .NET 9 SR2

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Android] Fix RadioButton using ContentPresenter not rendering #26030
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [ci] Build and sign arcade workloads #26009
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [ci] Bump branding for sr2 #25915
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Fix RadioButton using ContentPresenter not rendering #25947
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-radiobutton, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [net9.0] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #26008
    area-infrastructure, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Don't require obsolete ISystemResourcesProvider #26010
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Adding items to windows ObservableItemTemplateCollection #24777
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #26001
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 9 SR1.1

Updated

  • Fixed the picker title's color #23075
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232
    area-animation, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add options for specifying a minimum workload version requirement #25993
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Nested Flex Layouts #25036
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, layout-flex
  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add fallback to ContentPresenter Content binding using reflection #25992
    area-xaml
  • Updated the Blazor Hybrid Solution template to work better with the dotnet cli or IDEs that rely on it. #25997
    area-blazor, area-templates, community ✨
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge
  • Fix for issue 24557 Android OnKeyUp not capturing keypresses #25429
    platform/android 🤖
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment is off #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix Disabling some image tests after updating net9.0 with main #25770
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Android] - Fixed Flickering Issue When Toggling WebView Visibility #24753
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • Fixed Shell Navigating event issue when switching tabs #25749
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 11 #25855
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fixed Net 8: Page and control Unloaded events firing on iOS when navigating to another page #25852
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Reset ListView ScrolledEventArgs.ScrollY when ItemsSource changes #25362
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-listview
  • Border.Shadow hide the collectionView Header/footer - fix #25960
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • [Android] Custom shell back button color #22940
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] DatePicker (Format='D') #24296

  • [net9.0][Enhancement][Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599

  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • SwipeItemView won't render FontImageSource on first opening - fix #25397
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [iOS] ScrollView's Gradient Background fix #25541
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [Android] RefreshView in a grid #25413
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-refreshview
  • [Testing] Implement ScrollDownTo and ScrollUpTo methods in Appium #25601
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 3 #25734
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 7 #25795

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Where Clause Fails When Using Properties Initialized in Constructor #35175
  • ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT does not default to Development when using EF Core 9 if there is a IDesignTimeDbContextFactory implementation #35174
  • Properly calculate path for LambdaExpression #35170
    10.0.0
  • Update M.D.Sqlite "Xamarin limitations" page #35168

Closed

  • Open generic entity types are broken #35169
  • InvalidCastException When Reading Property with Inconsistent Column Types Across Multiple Databases #35161
  • EntityFrameworkCore SqlServer Ver. 9.0.0 NuGet package with Vulnerable System.Private.Uri Ver. 4.3.0 transitive package. #35167
  • whats the replacement for ColumnExpression.Table in v9? #35165

PullRequests

Created

  • Return null when the type is nullable for Cosmos Max/Min/Average #35173
  • Correct lambda evaluation in funcletizer #35172

Merged

  • Bump Cosmos SDK to 3.46.0 #35171
  • Fix contains test #35166
